name: Touchlab
tagline: We are the Kotlin Multiplatform experts.
description:
For almost a decade, Touchlab has been on the leading edge of mobile product development. Today that means helping our clients build products in a world where mobile platforms have matured. 
 
When engineering leaders need to accelerate feature development, maximize engineering efficiency and future-proof their teams and products, they partner with us. 
 
We work alongside our great partners to build unique solutions like guidance systems for forest rangers in Africa & Asia, an order-ahead app for North American coffee & donut enthusiasts, and open source mobile tools to change the way medical research gets done.
